name: ApexSqlDotPublish
description: Push created NuGet deployment package to an online feed.
author: ApexSQL LLC

inputs.name: packageFileName
inputs.label: Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter full path with file name and extension to NuGet package with stored execution outputs. Leave empty if package from previous task used

inputs.name: feedUrl
inputs.label: URL or package source key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter URL or package source key (as defined in nuget.config) for target NuGet feed

inputs.name: feedKey
inputs.label: API key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter NuGet feed API key if used
